TextView.android:text: Text Compressor takes your standard english words and converts them to the SMS lingo or Txtspk on the fly.
This app is useful for those who like to use predictive keyboards and auto-conversions but hate that their messages are just too long, or find the normal language to be just too uncool.
Conversion of words are handled by the word list. Go to the 'See words' menu to see, disable or add new word conversion.
